name: Random Post Loader
author: ChiHa

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin to add a widget to your website that loads random post(s) for you. ðŸ™‚

For Next Release

Image custom size
sections.installation:
1. Upload random-post-loader folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add Random Post to your sidebar,footer and ext. from your widgets options.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin support images?

Yes from version 1.1

How can change number of loaded posts?

From count below Random Post widget options.
sections.changelog:

  • First Release

1.1

  • Added show image option
  • Added image size
